description: Number of ways to color vertices of a heptagon using <= n colors, allowing rotations and reflections.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,200
prog: (PARI) { for (n=0, 200, write("b060532.txt", n, " ", (n^7 + 7*n^4 + 6*n)/14); ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 06 2009]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 12 2001
